snippet: Jennifer Capriati, the child prodigy who rebounded from off-the-court problems, is now a member of the International Tennis Hall of Fame.
abstract: Jennifer Capriati, the child prodigy who rebounded from off-the-court problems, is inducted into the International Tennis Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Capriati, the child prodigy who rebounded from off-the-court problems, is now a member of the International Tennis Hall of Fame.

headline.seo: Capriati Among Those Added to Tennis Hall of Fame
headline.main: Hall Induction Completes Capriati’s Turbulent Journey
headline.print_headline: Hall Induction Completes Capriati’s Turbulent Journey
